About.

Born and raised in Southern California. If I'm not behind the computer I'm usually surfing or looking for a pick-up soccer game.


Fun fact: After my last semester at Cal I was drafted in the 1st round to play professional soccer here in the states.

Education.

I got my undergrad in Architecture from the University of California, Berkeley (2010-2015).


I am currently studying backend software engineering.

Work.

I've been a Project Manager for the past 4 years at an architecture firm based out of San Clemente, CA.


I also lead the 3D innovation and technology department at the firm.
